root.title: Unauthorized System Time Modification
root.description: Detect scenarios where a potentially unauthorized application or user is modifying the system time.

references.item: Private Cuckoo Sandbox (from many years ago, no longer have hash, NDA as well)

root.author: @neu5ron

logsource.definition: Requirements: Audit Policy : System > Audit Security State Change, Group Policy : Computer Configuration\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Advanced Audit Policy Configuration\Audit Policies\System\Audit Security State Change

falsepositives.item: HyperV or other virtualization technologies with binary not listed in filter portion of detection
